item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Friends
We will be meeting at our home in Westport! For the winter we are going to sit by the fireplace and have the Bostons play outside (or inside if it is toooo cold).
In February we had a great time! The bostons were so cute and Robyn took some great pictures really showing the reason why we love them so much.Their personalities are so so cute!!! Hope you can join in the fun!!!
Bob and Linda

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier March Meetup
